title: State and Local Government Review Roundtable: The ‘Shifting Sands’ of American IGR in an Era of Flux and Uncertainty: What’s Happening and What to Expect
itunes:title: State and Local Government Review Roundtable: The ‘Shifting Sands’ of American IGR in an Era of Flux and Uncertainty: What’s Happening and What to Expect
description: In case you missed it: in this panel discussion at ASPA 2017, moderated by John Kincaid and introduced by SLGR Editor Michael J. Scicchitano, J. Edwin Benton, Timothy J. Conlan, Justin Marlowe, and Michael Pagano discuss their work prior to the special issue of SLGR, The "Shifting" Sands of American IGR in an Era of Flux and Uncertainty: What's Happening and What to Expect.
